Modifications.Value: Channel the Citadel Shield. The shield will deal 20 damage per second to enemies in a 600 area of effect and increase the armor of friendly units and buildings by 4, for a maximum of 30 seconds. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 20 damage per second |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 40 damage per second  |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 60 damage per second

Channel the Citadel Shield for up to 30 seconds. It will deal 20 damage per second in a 600 area of effect. It will also buff friendly units and buildings in the area giving them 4 additional armor. Has a 120 seconds cooldown and 2 seconds casting time.

Channel the Citadel Shield for up to 30 seconds. It will deal 40 damage per second in a 600 area of effect. It will also buff friendly units and buildings in the area giving them 10 additional armor. Has a 1100 seconds cooldown and 2 seconds casting time.

Channel the Citadel Shield for up to 30 seconds. It will deal 60 damage per second in a 600 area of effect. It will also buff friendly units and buildings in the area giving them 10 additional armor. Has a 100 seconds cooldown and 2 seconds casting time.

Channel the Citadel Shield for up to 180 seconds. It will deal 12 damage per second in a 1000 area of effect. It will also buff friendly buildings in the area giving them 10 additional armor. Has a 180 seconds cooldown and 2 seconds casting time.
